checkPlaneLandingLaneStatus(String, String, int, LocalDateTime, String) - Static method in class clases.main
This is the most convoluted function: First it checks if the plane can land on the landing lanes and then checks wether its already there or not If its not and the plane has no asigned landing lane it just adds the plane to the landing lane If it already has the same landing lane nothing but a System.out happens If the plane already has a diferent landing lane the funct ask the user wether to keep the original landing lane in wich case nothing happens or wether to change it to the new landing lane removing the plane from the lane traffic of said landing lane and updating the plane asigned landing lane information
